com.here.android.mpa.common

Class LocationDataSourceDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.common.LocationDataSource
      • com.here.android.mpa.common.LocationDataSourceDevice

  • public abstract class LocationDataSourceDevice
extends LocationDataSource
    Abstract class that defines the interface for providing positions updates from a platform location data source. Instance of this class can be created with LocationDataSourceDevice.getInstance() call.

      • getInstance

        public static LocationDataSourceDevice getInstance()
